Key Match Events: India and Afghanistan played out a goalless draw
Manvir had more than one opportunity to score in the first half but could not
Vikram Partap Singh had three chances to score but could not
Rahul Bheke intervened just in time to shrug the Afghanistan midfielder off the ball
Subhasish Bose nodded a Colaco corner inches wide of the target
Liston Colaco created one last opportunity, sprinting down the right flank
Pre-Game Insights: A win would do either team a world of good
For India, it would mean provisionally taking the second spot in Group A
Three points for Afghanistan would draw them level with Kuwait and India
Post-Match Reflections: India climbed to the second spot in Group A with four points from three matches
The equation was quite clear for both teams
The race to the second spot in the group is now a three-way battle
Miscellaneous Highlights: India and Afghanistan will now shift to Guwahati, where they will face off again on March 26
The match was played at the Damac Stadium in Abha, Saudi Arabia
